item.description:
Hello BookCrossers! Those of you who attended meetups regularly in the past will remember Steve, a Boston BookCrossing Meetup member for a long while. Steve moved to Texas a while back, but he will be in town this week! So, I'm scheduling a supplemental meetup so that we can all hang out with Steve.

However!! Newcomers are *always* welcome. If you love reading books, talking about books, buying books, giving books away, and/or hoarding books..... then clearly, you belong with us. Please come to this supplemental meetup even if you don't know Steve.

On the agenda: book-related socializing, literary theorizing, publishing gossip, bookstore comparisons, book sharing.... in other words, the usual :-)

I hope to see you there!

Everyone please notice: In keeping with the nostalgic feel of this particular supplemental meetup, I have located it at Cafe Bella Vita on Charles Street, not at our usual location. A nice change of scenery for this mid-month meet. (The Boston BookCrossers met at Cafe Bella Vita way way back in the olden days.)
item.name: BookCrossing Meetup: Supplemental
